title: mt魔改配置
author: 九耀龙翔
txt_content:
本来想自己改mt魔改
furnace.remove(<BigReactors:BRIngot:2>, <minecraft:coal>);
furnace.addRecipe(<BigReactors:BRIngot:2>, <ThermalFoundation:material:2>,0.5);
删掉煤炭烧br碳棒的合成，添加te煤粉烧br碳棒，但是加载之后显示

WARNIGN：NO furnace repcips for<BigReactors:BRIngot:2>
明明碳粉的合成加进去了，煤炭烧碳棒的合成却没有删掉
求大佬
急

replies.author: 九耀龙翔
